versos: (carved) Isaiah 44:13 - "The carpenter measures with a line and makes an outline with a marker; he roughs it out with chisels and marks it with compasses. He shapes it in human form, human form in all its glory, that it may dwell in a shrine.";;;
(fowl) Genesis 1:20 - "And God said, Let the waters bring forth abundantly the moving creature that hath life, and fowl that may fly above the earth in the open firmament of heaven.";;;
(passing) 1 Peter 1:24 - "For all flesh is as grass, and all the glory of man as the flower of grass. The grass withereth, and the flower thereof falleth away:";;;
(beset) Psalm 22:12 - "Many bulls beset me; strong bulls of Bashan surround me.";;;
(shean) I'm sorry, but there is no Bible verse that contains the word "shean.";;;

(ophrah) Judges 6:11 - "The angel of the Lord came and sat down under the oak in ophrah that belonged to Joash the Abiezrite, where his son Gideon was threshing wheat in a winepress to keep it from the Midianites.";;;
(lewdness) Ezekiel 23:21 - "So you longed for the lewdness of your youth, when in Egypt your bosom was caressed and your young breasts fondled.";;;
(array) 1 Chronicles 12:24 - "The men of Judah who bore shield and spear were 6,800, armed for war.";;;
(fasted) Matthew 4:2 - "After fasting forty days and forty nights, he was hungry.";;;
(gleaned) Psalm 129:6 - "May those who pass by not say to them, 'The blessing of the Lord be on you; we bless you in the name of the Lord.'";;;
(voices) 1 Samuel 3:10 - And the Lord came and stood

(highway) Isaiah 35:8 - And a highway will be there; it will be called the Way of Holiness; it will be for those who walk on that Way. The unclean will not journey on it; wicked fools will not go about on it.
(dance) Let them praise his name with dancing and make music to him with timbrel and harp. - Psalm 149:3 NIV;;;
(danced) Psalm 149:3 - "Let them praise his name with dancing and make music to him with timbrel and harp.";;;
(repaired) 2 Kings 12:4 - "The repairs to the temple of the Lord were necessary.";;;
(naomi) Ruth 1:2 NIV - The man's name was Elimelek
(moveth) Genesis 1:2 - "And the earth was without form, and void; and darkness was upon the face of the deep. And the Spirit of God moved upon the face of the waters.";;;
(minded) Philippians 2:5 - "Let this mind be in you which was also in Christ Jesus.";;;
